page.title: 11HOATH HOMELIFE
page.content: There is a farm behind our garden. This is called Fullers farm. Mr. Fuller has just retired so he moved down the road and his son moved into Mr. Fullers old house. .they also have put silos up for corn. They sold some cows and they have always let my brother and sister play in the field behind my garden, when we were building they let us tip the old bricks and dirt in a field or on their farm. Sometimes when it has been snowing we go in the field behind our garden because there is a slope in it. There are lots of slurry pits so we can't go too near the farm they are as deep as our house which is a bungalow.
